revised_title: Coexpression and Function of TERM-1 and Fasciclin II in Axonal Outgrowth of Identified Brain Interneurons in Grasshopper
tldr: This study investigates the coexpression and function of TERM-1 and fasciclin II during axonal outgrowth of identified brain interneurons in grasshopper embryos. The researchers found that both molecules are important for correct axonal guidance and confirm the existence of functional molecular labels on defined axon pathways in the developing nervous system.
